basics.name: Hassain Alsayhah
basics.label: Software Engineering Graduate
basics.summary: Software engineering graduate equipped with strong software development foundations and expertise in artificial intelligence. Proven success in project management and implementing AI solutions. Demonstrated track record of leading technical teams, managing vendor relationships, and delivering complex projects. Strong communicator skilled at bridging technical and business needs. Passionate about teaching and committed to continuous learning.

education.institution: King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals (KFUPM)
King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST)

experience.company: King Salman Global Academy for Arabic Language (KSGAAL)
highlights: Leading the development of an educational series focused on Arabic NLP concepts
Orchestrating end to end production of educational content, from expert sourcing to platform deployment
Managing vendor relationships and negotiating contracts, achieving remarkable cost savings

experience.company: King Salman Global Academy for Arabic Language (KSGAAL)
highlights: Developed integrated database and AI solutions for KSGAAL platforms
Implemented Retrieval augmented generation (RAG) modules with LLMs
Integrated the robot Pepper with RAGs and LLMs to make it interact with humans

teaching.institution: King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST)
highlights: Delivered hands-on education in fundamental AI concepts including regression, NNs, and CNNs
Created practical exercises to reinforce student understanding of core machine learning concepts
Assisted instructors with curriculum delivery and managed student exams, including grading

research.institution: SDAIA-KFUPM Joint Research Center for Artificial Intelligence (JRCAI)
highlights: Led research on token reduction through Arabic transliteration optimization using instruction tuning
Benchmarked Arabic language processing across major LLMs (GPT-4, Claude, ALLaM, Llama 3.1)
Implementing various transliteration methods to improve LLM efficiency

research.institution: King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST)
highlights: Completed 320+ hours of specialized AI training in Generative Models, ML, RL, CV, and NLP
Conducted research on how using new data augmentation strategies from multiple domains affects fairness and accuracy in deep neural networks for image classifiers

soft: Ability to learn, adapt, and grow

leadership.organization: Computer Club, King Fahd University of Petroleum and Minerals
highlights: Led 70+ member technical community, organizing 50+ events and workshops
Managed club operations using Notion for planning and collaboration
Achieved Best Club and Best Leader awards under my leadership
Advised club leadership on strategic planning and event organization
Facilitated collaboration between the club and university administration
Helped in Coordinating and executing diverse, world class academic conferences, workshops, and seminars
Support community outreach and student engagement initiatives

honors: Best Student Club Leader & Best Club Awards in 2024 from KFUPM
Second Place, AWS DeepRacer Student League Saudi Arabia 2024

references.name: Dr. Naeemullah Khan
references.position: Deputy Director of KAUST Academy, Instructional Assistant Professor In Artificial Intelligence
references.company: King Abdullah University of Science and Technology (KAUST)
